title: 126 - Politics; Do the Ends Justify the Means?
description:
In this episode, we present a recent article that attempts to bring reasonable defense to how you could support Roy Moore and still consider yourself a non-compromising Christian. We don't buy it. This however stems much further past Moore, he is merely a test case to present a perspective when looking at electing folks who are not being held in account to upstanding Christian character. 

Written by Denise McAllister here: http://thefederalist.com/2017/11/28/justified-vote-morally-questionable-politician/

- Mike Erre
